## Pre-Lecture Quiz

*A warm-up quiz about HTML*

Complete this quiz in class

1. HTML stands for 'HyperText Mockup Language'

- [ ] [true]
- [ ] [false]

2. All HTML tags need both opening and closing tags

- [ ] [true]
- [ ] [false]

3. Using semantic markup is most important for 

- [ ] [code readability]
- [ ] [screen readers]
- [ ] [maintenance]
